item.title: Hotfix #72 (1.8.4)
item.description:
Hey Everyone,¬†

Hotfix #72 (1.8.4) is currently rolling out across our platforms. In the meantime, you can read the notes below.

  • Fixed server crash occurring while playing Refinery Delta-17.

  • Rolled back to FSR version 3.1.2. This change is made to ensure the best overall experience for players, while maintaining support for key features like FSR 4 and others. We're actively working on updating to a newer version in the future and will reintroduce newer improvements when ready.

  • Fixed issue where the Arbites Talent 'Razor-Jaw Augment' was being affected by Cyber-Mastiff damage increasing buffs.

Dev Note: Regarding the last issue on the list, this resulted in damage being increased by up to 450% at times.

Havoc Campaign - Mission Pool and Mutator Rotation

Every third week during a Havoc Campaign, we are rotating the mission pool and mutator pool. One or two missions and mutators will swap out during this time. This rotation will happen next week.

Mission Pool

Incoming

  • Hab Dreyko

  • Mercantile HL-70-04-510

Outgoing

  • Consignment Yard HL17-36

  • Chasm Logistratum

Mutators

Incoming

  • None

Outgoing

  • Pus-Hardened Skin

  • Inferno Special Event

item.title: Hotfix #71 (1.8.3)
item.description:
Hey Everyone,¬†

Hotfix #71 (1.8.3) is currently rolling out across our platforms. In the meantime, you can read the notes below.

To stay consistent with how Arbites cosmetics have been presented to players, we‚Äôve deployed a fix for an issue introduced with Hotfix #70 where precinct decals were incorrectly appearing on them. With Hotfix #71 the intended decal behavior will be the following:

  • All progression gear upper bodies will display the selected precinct number. The upper body of the deluxe edition will remain unchanged.¬†

  • The cape in the Deluxe edition of the Arbites DLC will not display a precinct number.

  • Earnable in-game cosmetics that include capes will not show a precinct number on capes.

  • The Arbitrator Revelatum Plate with Covert Ops Coat (Lucis) in the Commodore's Vestures will not display the precinct number on the right shoulder anymore - to stay consistent with how the cosmetic was presented to players.

General Fixes

  • Upgraded to the latest version of FSR (3.1.4).¬†

  • Fixed an issue where Basic Training rewards preview images were displayed in an incorrect size.

  • Fixed an issue where backstory choices were randomized at the start of an operation in the Barber-Chirurgeon instead of using the player saved backstory.

  • Fixed an issue with the ‚ÄòChained Deathblow‚Äô Turtolsky Heavy Sword blessing where the critical chance bonus would not scale correctly on all tiers.

  • Additional fixes for a crash that could occur when Auspex devices started playing sounds the same time as the player wielded a weapon.

  • Fixed an issue that was causing the server to crash when players would step in specific locations in several missions.

Cosmetic & Animation Fixes

  • Fix for the Veteran ‚ÄúRegimental Beret‚Äù headgear cosmetic causing part of hairline to be hidden.¬†¬†

  • Fixed an issue where some headgear cosmetics would cause the hairline of the characters to break.

Arbites Fixes & Tweaks

General Fixes & Tweaks

  • Lowered requirements for some Arbites Penances:

    • 'Justice Dispensed' from 3500 to 750

    • 'Arbites Gunner' from 3500 to 2000

    • 'Castigator's Arrest' from 3500 to 2000

  • Fixed an issue where sound was not playing correctly when the Nuncio Aquila ability expired.

  • Fixed an issue where some enemies were getting deformed when pounced on by the Cyber-Mastiff.

  • Smoke-emitting VFX are now enabled again for Cyber-Mastiff cosmetics displaying said effects.

  • Fixed an issue where 'Remote Detonation' could trigger Ranged Attack bonuses (e.g. the ‚ÄòPuncture‚Äô weapon blessing).

  • Fixed an issue where blood effects were not being applied on the Shock Maul and Suppression Shield head.

  • Fixed an issue where 'Prosecution Blow' didn't apply correctly.

  • Fixed an issue where the ‚ÄòPinpointing Target‚Äô blessing would not trigger on the Shotpistol and Riot Shield.

  • Inspiring Recitation now correctly applies the intended 30% damage reduction, as stated in its description.

  • Fixed ‚ÄòCastigator's Stance‚Äô not replenishing Toughness on activation while standing on fire surfaces.

  • Fixed an issue where players couldn't tag enemies in certain cases while using the double tag setting.

  • Fixed an issue where enemies tagged with ‚ÄòExecution Order‚Äô would stay tagged even when not relevant to the mission anymore.

We‚Äôll see you on the Mourningstar.¬†

‚Äì The Darktide Team
